com.att.aro.diagnostics

Class GraphPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.att.aro.diagnostics.GraphPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, org.jfree.chart.ChartMouseListener

    public class GraphPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, org.jfree.chart.ChartMouseListener
    Represents the Graph Panel that contains the graph in the Diagnostics tab.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • GraphPanel

        public GraphPanel()
        Initializes a new instance of the GraphPanel class.

    • Method Detail

      • setChartOptions

        public void setChartOptions(java.util.List<ChartPlotOptions> optionsSelected)
        Sets the chart plot options to those selected by clicking the Options menu item in the View menu.
        Parameters:
        optionsSelected - A List of ChartPlotOptions to be set on the GraphPanel chart.

      • resetChart

        public void resetChart(TraceData.Analysis analysis)
        Resets the chart labels, and the chart and axis information of the GraphPanel when the specified trace data is loaded. The current instance of the GraphPanel is preserved, along with the current zoom state. The scroll bar is moved to position 0.
        Parameters:
        analysis - - An Analysis object containing the new trace analysis data.

      • setMaxZoom

        public void setMaxZoom(int zoom)
        Sets the maximum number of times a user can zoom in or zoom out. Each zoom increment doubles the precision. The default zoom value is 5.
        Parameters:
        zoom - - The maximum zoom value that can be set.

      • setZoomFactor

        public void setZoomFactor(double zoomFactor)
        Sets the zoom factor. The default value is 2, meaning that the zoom doubles in precision for each zoom increment.
        Parameters:
        zoomFactor - A double that indicates the zoom factor.

      • setGraphView

        public void setGraphView(double graphCrosshairSetting)
        Sets the GraphPanel cross hair to the specified value, and centers the graph on the cross hair.
        Parameters:
        graphCrosshairSetting - A double that is the new cross-hair value.

      • setGraphView

        public void setGraphView(double graphCrosshairSetting,
                boolean centerChartOnCrosshair)
        Sets the GraphPanel cross hair to the specified value, and centers the graph on the cross hair if the centerChartOnCrosshair parameter is "true".
        Parameters:
        graphCrosshairSetting - A timestamp that is the new cross hair setting.
        centerChartOnCrosshair - A boolean value that indicates whether the graph should be centered on the new cross hair value.

      • getViewportLowerBound

        public double getViewportLowerBound()
        Returns the lower bound of the area of the GraphPanel that is visible to the user (the viewport).
        Returns:
        A double value that is the lower bound of the viewport.

      • getViewportUpperBound

        public double getViewportUpperBound()
        Returns the upper bound of the area of the GraphPanel that is visible to the user (the viewport).
        Returns:
        A double value that is the highest bound of the viewport.

      • getGraphLength

        public float getGraphLength()
        Returns the total length of the graph based on its axis.
        Returns:
        A float value that is the total length of the graph.

      • addGraphPanelListener

        public void addGraphPanelListener(GraphPanelListener listner)
        Adds a listener to the GraphPanel.
        Parameters:
        listner - - The listener to add to the Graph Panel. The listener must be an implementation of the com.att.aro.main.GraphPanelListener interface.

      • removeGraphPanelListener

        public void removeGraphPanelListener(GraphPanelListener l)
        Removes a listener from the GraphPanel.
        Parameters:
        l - - The listener to be removed from the GraphPanel.

      • getCrosshair

        public double getCrosshair()
        Returns the current cross hair value.
        Returns:
        A double that is the current cross hair value for the GraphPanel.

      • isCrossHairInViewport

        public boolean isCrossHairInViewport()
        Returns a value that indicates if the GraphPanel cross hair is within the viewport (the viewable lower and upper bounds).
        Returns:
        A boolean value that is "true" if the cross-hair is within the viewport.

      • chartMouseMoved

        public void chartMouseMoved(org.jfree.chart.ChartMouseEvent event)
        This method is invoked when a mouse move event occurs in the GraphPanel.
